title: Create Security Policies and Procedures
description: Develop and document security policies, procedures, and guidelines covering areas such as access control, data protection, incident response, and risk management.

title: Develop Incident Response Plan 2
description: Create a comprehensive incident response plan outlining procedures for detecting, responding to, and recovering from security incidents such as data breaches or cyber attacks

title: Configure Firewall Rules
description: Configure and maintain firewall rules and access control lists (ACLs) to control network traffic and enforce security policies, blocking unauthorized access and malicious traffic.

title: Conduct Penetration Testing
description: Perform penetration testing on network infrastructure and web applications to identify vulnerabilities and weaknesses, and provide recommendations for mitigation
